StationpediaPage.Title: Fabricators
Devices
Smelting
StationpediaPage.Text: Once you have {LINK:OrePage;ore}, you need to turn it into {LINK:IngotPage;ingots} so you can use their {LINK:ReagentPage;reagents}. Smelting will often produce {LINK:GasPage;gases}. This occurs in either the {THING:StructureArcFurnace} (for simple recipes) and the {THING:StructureFurnace} for more complicated {LINK:AlloyPage;Alloys}, and finally the {THING:StructureAdvancedFurnace} for very complicated {LINK:SuperAlloyPage;Superalloys}. For the complex alloys, you will need to achieve mixtures at perfect ratios, {LINK:TemperaturePage;Temperature}, and {LINK:PressurePage;Pressure}.

StationpediaPage.Title: Mining
StationpediaPage.Text: You can mine {LINK:OrePage;ore} using a {THING:ItemMiningDrill}. If you wear a {THING:ItemMiningBelt} the {LINK:OrePage;ore} will automatically be placed within it.
